results.title: First documented case of Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome in Syria: clinical presentation, diagnosis, and experimental management with simvastatin.
results.text_hl: First documented case of @DISEASE_Smith_Lemli_Opitz_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D019082 @@@Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome@@@ in Syria: clinical presentation, diagnosis, and experimental management with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: [Maximal initial dose of simvastatin causing acute renal failure through rhabdomyolysis: risk factors, pathomechanism and therapy related to a case].
results.text_hl: UNLABELLED: @DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@Rhabdomyolysis@@@ (@DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@RML@@@) is a rare and severe adverse effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@).

citations.NLM: Deme D, Al-Hadad A, Varga T, Szántó E, Sándor K, Rakonczai E. [Maximal initial dose of simvastatin causing acute renal failure through rhabdomyolysis: risk factors, pathomechanism and therapy related to a case]. Orv Hetil. 2009 Feb 8;150(6):265-9. PMID: 19179259
